comment: Poetry can run Python code from a project using `poetry run`.

inherit.code:
mkdir /path/to/project
cd /path/to/project
poetry init -n
echo 'import os; os.system("/bin/sh -ip")' >file.py
poetry run python ./file.py
inherit.comment: This runs Python code (`import os; os.system("/bin/sh -ip")`) from the specified file.

shell.code:
mkdir /path/to/project
cd /path/to/project
poetry init -n
echo 'import os; os.system("/bin/sh -ip")' >file.py
poetry run python file.py
shell.comment: If the script launches a shell, it is executed in the current context.
